title.rendered: 23 Celebs Who Did Time Behind Bars

content.rendered:
Teresa Giudice isn’t the only star to do hard time. Far from it.

Here’s a list of 23 celebrities who got locked up … some of whom you know, but many of whom might surprise you quite a bit.
